name: Burung Terbang
description:
Burung Terbang - game Plaffy bird versi saya

game ini seperti plaffy bird namun versi sya.

ayo download dan mainkan hingga capai score terbaik anda.

game ini mudah untuk di mainkan.

mohon maaf apabila masih ada bug dan masih dalam proses pengembangan.

good luck :)

english :

flying bird

This game is like Plaffy Bird but my version.

let's download and achieve your best score.

this game is easy to play

apologize if there are still bugs and are still in the process of being developed.

good luck :)
